subject: Research ideas and internship
body:
Dear {{user.firstName}}

I hope you're doing great and enjoying the good weather!

Once again, thank you for choosing me to supervise your Master's thesis; I'm sure it's going to be a lot of fun! A quick question: Do you already have an idea of what your topic will be? I'll of course give you complete creative control, but please have a rough research outline ready soon. That way we can keep developing good ideas together.

In other news: My friend Laura, who's the director of the Von-Ranke-Museum, is looking for an intern. It's over summer, so I thought it would be perfect for you. Maybe you'll get some good ideas while working for her. I told her over dinner last night about your past few papers and she was thrilled to hear about you.

Give her a call and say who you are, so that you can start next Monday.

All the best and talk to you soon

- Alex -
